tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE irrigation_system (
    system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farm_id INT,
    system_type VARCHAR(50),
    irrigation_area DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (farm_id) REFERENCES farmers(farmer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE farm (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farmer_id INT,
    crop_type VARCHAR(50),
    acres DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (farmer_id) REFERENCES farmer(id)
);

CREATE TABLE irrigation_system (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farm_id INT,
    system_type VARCHAR(50),
    water_source VARCHAR(50),
    capacity DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (farm_id) REFERENCES farm(id)
);

CREATE TABLE water_usage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_id INT,
    date DATE,
    total_water_used DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES irrigation_system(id)
);

CREATE TABLE WaterSources (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR(255),
    capacity FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Fields (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_name VARCHAR(255),
    size FLOAT,
    location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE IrrigationSystems (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_name VARCHAR(255),
    field_id INT REFERENCES Fields(id),
    water_source_id INT REFERENCES WaterSources(id)
)

CREATE TABLE IrrigationLogs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    irrigation_date DATE,
    system_id INT REFERENCES IrrigationSystems(id),
    water_used FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE FarmManagers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    manager_name VARCHAR(255),
    field_id INT REFERENCES Fields(id)
)
